sense.name: promote the development or growth of
sense.examples: South Park, the neighborhood that fostered the dot.com boom is back! This project has fostered the development of database techniques. Christianity has fostered the idea of filial responsibility.

sense.name: bring up (children/animals) in foster care
sense.examples: When I have a good job, I want to foster homeless kittens. After her parents died, she was fostered by different families until she turned 18.
